iti70:2.1: “Dittha maya, bhikkhave, satta kayaduccaritena samannagata vaciduccaritena samannagata manoduccaritena samannagata ariyanam upavadaka micchaditthika micchaditthikammasamadana.
iti70:2.2: Te kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapanna.
iti70:3.1: Tam kho panaham, bhikkhave, nannassa samanassa va brahmanassa va sutva vadami.
iti70:3.2: Dittha maya, bhikkhave, satta kayaduccaritena samannagata vaciduccaritena samannagata manoduccaritena samannagata ariyanam upavadaka micchaditthika micchaditthikammasamadana.
iti70:3.3: Te kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapanna.
iti70:3.4: Api ca, bhikkhave, yadeva samam natam samam dittham samam viditam tadevaham vadami.
iti70:4.1: Dittha maya, bhikkhave, satta kayaduccaritena samannagata vaciduccaritena samannagata manoduccaritena samannagata ariyanam upavadaka micchaditthika micchaditthikammasamadana.
iti70:4.2: Te kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapanna”ti.
iti70:7.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
